tooltip.configurable_everything.biome: Enable or disable the Biome config.
tooltip.configurable_everything.biome_pl: Enable or disable the Biome Placement config.
tooltip.configurable_everything.datafixe: Enable or disable the Datafixer config.
tooltip.configurable_everything.fluid: Enable or disable the Fluid config.
tooltip.configurable_everything.game: Enable or disable the Game config.
tooltip.configurable_everything.screen_s: Enable or disable the Screen Shake config.
tooltip.configurable_everything.splash_t: Enable or disable the Splash Text config.
tooltip.configurable_everything.surface_: Enable or disable the Surface Rule config.
tooltip.configurable_everything.apply_da: Enable or disable the datapacks folder in config/configurable_everything.
tooltip.configurable_everything.datapack: Enable or disable biome changes from datapacks.
Enable or disable biome placement changes from datapacks.
tooltip.configurable_everything.json5_su: Enable or disable support for JSON5 files in datapacks.
tooltip.configurable_everything.entity: Enable or disable the Entity config.
tooltip.configurable_everything.sound_ev:
Enables Flyby sounds that are linked to different Sound Events.
Individual sounds can be controlled via config file.
tooltip.configurable_everything.dig_spee:
Modifies the Player's dig speed.
This is a percentage.
tooltip.configurable_everything.entity_a: Contains options to amplify entity attributes.
The entity type to apply the attribute amplifier to.

The name of the entity type to apply the attribute amplifier to.
Ignored if blank.
The attribute amplifiers to apply to the entity selection.
The attribute to apply the amplifier to.
The amplifier to apply to the attribute.
tooltip.configurable_everything.entity_h: Contains options for Entity Hurt Effects.
tooltip.configurable_everything.baby_zom: Whether or not Baby Zombies spawn sprint particles.
tooltip.configurable_everything.zombies_: Whether or not Zombies will actively avoid the sun.
tooltip.configurable_everything.ignore_z: Allows Zombies to break Doors outside Hard difficulty.
tooltip.configurable_everything.all_zomb: Whether or not all Zombies can break Doors.
tooltip.configurable_everything.ignore_z: Allows Zombie reinforcements to spawn outside Hard difficulty.
tooltip.configurable_everything.full_zom: Whether or not Zombie reinforcements should spawn 100% of the time.
tooltip.configurable_everything.skeleton:
Skeletons will ignore the game's difficulty when firing arrows.
This will be equivalent to Hard difficulty.
Whether or not Skeletons will actively avoid the sun.
tooltip.configurable_everything.flaming_:
Enable or disable Flint & Steel functionality when a
flaming Arrow hits a block or entity.
tooltip.configurable_everything.added_sp: Strings that should be added to the main menu's splash texts.
tooltip.configurable_everything.removed_:
Strings representing splash texts that should be removed.
Must be the exact text.
tooltip.configurable_everything.splash_c: The color splash text should be displayed in
tooltip.configurable_everything.world: Enable or disable the World config.
tooltip.configurable_everything.fix_sun_:
Changes how the position of the Sun and Moon rotate so they
will smoothly move across the sky as opposed to snap to
a new position. Noticeable with higher day time speeds.
tooltip.configurable_everything.disable_: Enable or disable the experimental warning screen when creating or loading worlds.
